languages.text:
Once per combat on 0 Wounds wielder recovers {uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} Wounds and gains 100 Momentum.
Base Armour Property: +15% Armour against ranged attacks

traits.locale_text:
Once per combat on 0 Wounds wielder recovers {uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} Wounds and gains 100 Momentum.
Base Armour Property: +15% Armour against ranged attacks

languages.text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа впервые за бой снижается до 0, он остается в сознании, немедленно восстанавливает {uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} здоровья и получает 100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против дистанционных атак.

traits.locale_text: Once the wielder's wounds are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they remain in combat, immediately regain +(TGH bonus + WP bonus) wounds, and gain +100 momentum. Base armour property: +15% amour against ranged attacks.

Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı çatışmada ilk kez 0'a düştüğünde anında +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} sağlık puanını geri kazanarak çatışmada kalır ve +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} elde eder. Taban zırh özelliği: Menzilli saldırılara karşı +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı çatışmada ilk kez 0'a düştüğünde anında +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} sağlık puanını geri kazanarak çatışmada kalır ve +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} elde eder. Taban zırh özelliği: Menzilli saldırılara karşı +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}.

Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} çatışmada ilk kez 0'a düştüğünde anında +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} sağlık puanını geri kazanarak çatışmada kalır ve +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} elde eder. Taban {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} özelliği: Menzilli saldırılara karşı +%15 zırh.

languages.text: La primera vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan a 0 en un combate, recupera inmediatamente +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} heridas, sigue en el combate y gana +100 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ataques a distancia.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

traits.locale_text: La primera vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan a 0 en un combate, recupera inmediatamente +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} heridas, sigue en el combate y gana +100 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ataques a distancia.

languages.text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}在战斗中首次降为0时，会立刻恢复{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731}点生命值，继续战斗，同时获得+100{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗远程攻击时，获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. traits.locale_text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}在战斗中首次降为0时，会立刻恢复{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731}点生命值，继续战斗，同时获得+100{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗远程攻击时，获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。

languages.text: La première fois que les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur sont réduites à 0, il regagne immédiatement +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} blessures et continue le combat avec +100 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +15% à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} contre les attaques à distance.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. traits.locale_text: La première fois que les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur sont réduites à 0, il regagne immédiatement +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} blessures et continue le combat avec +100 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +15% à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} contre les attaques à distance.

La première fois que les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur sont réduites à 0, il regagne immédiatement +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} blessures et continue le combat avec +100 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +15 % à l'Armure contre les attaques à distance.

languages.text: 戦闘における使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が最初は0に低減され、即座に+{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731}の傷を再び受け、戦闘の間継続し、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}+100を付与される。 基本アーマー特性：範囲攻撃に対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+15%

traits.locale_text: 戦闘における使用者の傷が最初は0に低減され、即座に+{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731}の傷を再び受け、戦闘の間継続し、推進力+100を付与される。 基本アーマー特性：範囲攻撃に対するアーマー+15%

languages.text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers im Kampf erstmals auf 0, regeneriert er sofort +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} Wunden, bleibt im Kampf und erhält +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Fernkampfangriffe.
